About Me

I've always looked for ways to make work easier and eliminate repetition. When I understand something well, sharing it feels natural.

Years working abroad and collaborating with international teams - across large corporations and small organizations - shaped how I think.

My technical background adds another layer: I understand both the business side and how things actually work under the hood.

Creating my first Udemy course revealed how much I enjoyed this work. I continued with more courses and technical webinars for AI master's program at WSKZ.

My approach: grasp the underlying principles, not just the surface-level how-to. Be someone who can judge what makes sense, not just execute what's trending. That's how you make smart AI decisions for your specific situation.

Locked in on

AI Training & Enablement

I run team and individual workshops for companies and individuals - from AI introduction to practical applications in daily work. I teach not just tools, but most importantly how to think about AI in a business context.

Fractional Operations & Project Support

I support companies in operationalizing AI - helping move from knowledge to implementation, coordinating projects, connecting technical teams with business goals.

HRTech Startup Co-founder

I'm co-building an HRTech startup - wearing PM, AI Engineer, and Sales hats. Practically testing everything I teach.

Interested in working together or learning more?
